House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00540
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR A COMPREHENSIVE HAZARDOUS AND RADIOACTIVE WASTES MANAGEMENT AND PROVIDING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATIONS THEREOF
SHORT TITLE : Hazardous And Radioactive Wastes Management Act
